blocks.name: om2uz0i
blocks.content: The mapping ` G ` is a one-to-one mapping from ` _om ` onto upper integers that will be used to construct a recursive definition generator. Ordinal natural number 0 maps to complex number ` C ` (normally 0 for the upper integers ` NN0 ` or 1 for the upper integers ` NN ` ), 1 maps to ` C ` + 1, etc. This theorem shows the value of ` G ` at ordinal natural number zero. (This series of theorems generalizes an earlier series for ` NN0 ` contributed by Raph Levien, 10-Apr-2004.) (Contributed by NM, 3-Oct-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Sep-2013.)

blocks.name: om2uzsuci
blocks.content: The value of ` G ` (see ~ om2uz0i ) at a successor. (Contributed by NM, 3-Oct-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Sep-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm om2uzsuci(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, com), wceq(cfv(c1, csuc(c0)), co(cfv(c1, c0), caddc, nat1)))
  -| wcel(c2, cz)
  -| wceq(c1, cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), c2), com))
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, com), wceq(cfv(c1, csuc(c0)), co(cfv(c1, c0), caddc, nat1))), wcel(c2, cz))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, com), wceq(cfv(c1, csuc(c0)), co(cfv(c1, c0), caddc, nat1))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  vtoclga(hs0, c0, com, wceq(cfv(c1, csuc(c0)), co(cfv(c1, c0), caddc, nat1)), wceq(cfv(c1, csuc(cv(hs0))), co(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1)))
  eqeq12d(cfv(c1, csuc(cv(hs0))), co(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), cfv(c1, csuc(c0)), co(cfv(c1, c0), caddc, nat1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2d(c1, csuc(cv(hs0)), csuc(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  suceq(cv(hs0), c0)
  oveq1d(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1, cfv(c1, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  mpan2(wcel(cv(hs0), com), wceq(cfv(c1, csuc(cv(hs0))), co(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1)), wcel(co(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), universe))
  ovex(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1)
  frsucmpt2(s0, hs1, cv(hs0), co(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), universe, c1, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), c2, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))
  oveq1(cv(hs1), cv(s0), caddc, nat1)
  oveq1(cv(hs1), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(com)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cfv(c1, csuc(c0)), co(cfv(c1, c0), caddc, nat1)))
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(co(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1))
  diff.hs1.c(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm om2uzsuci(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà _om ‚Üí(c1 ` suc(c0))=((c1 ` c0)[+]1))
  ‚ä£ c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§
  ‚ä£ c1 =(rec((s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s0[+]1)), c2)|` _om)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà _om ‚Üí(c1 ` suc(c0))=((c1 ` c0)[+]1)), c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§)
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà _om ‚Üí(c1 ` suc(c0))=((c1 ` c0)[+]1)), d(s0, c2))
  vtoclga(hs0, c0, com, (c1 ` suc(c0))=((c1 ` c0)[+]1), (c1 ` suc(hs0))=((c1 ` hs0)[+]1))
  eqeq12d((c1 ` suc(hs0)), ((c1 ` hs0)[+]1), (c1 ` suc(c0)), ((c1 ` c0)[+]1), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2d(c1, suc(hs0), suc(c0), hs0 = c0)
  suceq(hs0, c0)
  oveq1d((c1 ` hs0), caddc, nat1, (c1 ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, c1)
  mpan2(hs0 ‚àà _om, (c1 ` suc(hs0))=((c1 ` hs0)[+]1), ((c1 ` hs0)[+]1)‚àà ùïå)
  ovex((c1 ` hs0), caddc, nat1)
  frsucmpt2(s0, hs1, hs0, ((c1 ` hs0)[+]1), universe, c1, (s0[+]1), c2, (hs1[+]1))
  oveq1(hs1, s0, caddc, nat1)
  oveq1(hs1, (c1 ` hs0), caddc, nat1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(com)
  diff.hs0.w((c1 ` suc(c0))=((c1 ` c0)[+]1))
  diff.co.s(s0, hs1, caddc, nat1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(((c1 ` hs0)[+]1))
  diff.hs1.c((s0[+]1))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: om2uzuzi
blocks.content: The value ` G ` (see ~ om2uz0i ) at an ordinal natural number is in the upper integers. (Contributed by NM, 3-Oct-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Sep-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm om2uzuzi(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, com), wcel(cfv(c1, c0), cfv(cuz, c2)))
  -| wcel(c2, cz)
  -| wceq(c1, cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), c2), com))
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  finds(hs0, hs1, c0, wcel(cfv(c1, c0), cfv(cuz, c2)), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(cuz, c2)), wcel(cfv(c1, emptycls), cfv(cuz, c2)), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(hs1)), cfv(cuz, c2)), wcel(cfv(c1, csuc(cv(hs1))), cfv(cuz, c2)))
  eleq1d(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(cuz, c2), cfv(c1, emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), emptycls, c1)
  eleq1d(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(cuz, c2), cfv(c1, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c1)
  eleq1d(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(cuz, c2), cfv(c1, csuc(cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1))))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1)), c1)
  eleq1d(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(cuz, c2), cfv(c1, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  eqeltri(cfv(c1, emptycls), cfv(cuz, c2), c2)
  om2uz0i(s0, c1, c2)
  ax-mp(wcel(c2, cfv(cuz, c2)), wcel(c2, cz))
  uzid(c2)
  syl5ibr(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(hs1)), cfv(cuz, c2)), wcel(cfv(c1, csuc(cv(hs1))), cfv(cuz, c2)), wcel(co(cfv(c1, cv(hs1)), caddc, nat1), cfv(cuz, c2)))
  peano2uz(cfv(c1, cv(hs1)), c2)
  eleq1d(cfv(c1, csuc(cv(hs1))), cfv(cuz, c2), co(cfv(c1, cv(hs1)), caddc, nat1), wcel(cv(hs1), com))
  om2uzsuci(s0, cv(hs1), c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cfv(c1, c0), cfv(cuz, c2)))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cfv(c1, emptycls), cfv(cuz, c2)))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cfv(c1, cv(hs1)), cfv(cuz, c2)))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cfv(c1, csuc(cv(hs1))), cfv(cuz, c2)))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(cuz, c2)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm om2uzuzi(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà _om ‚Üí(c1 ` c0)‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c2))
  ‚ä£ c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§
  ‚ä£ c1 =(rec((s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s0[+]1)), c2)|` _om)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  finds(hs0, hs1, c0, (c1 ` c0)‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c2), (c1 ` hs0)‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c2), (c1 ` ‚àÖ)‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c2), (c1 ` hs1)‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c2), (c1 ` suc(hs1))‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c2))
  eleq1d((c1 ` hs0), (‚Ñ§‚â• ` c2), (c1 ` ‚àÖ), hs0 = ‚àÖ)
  fveq2(hs0, emptycls, c1)
  eleq1d((c1 ` hs0), (‚Ñ§‚â• ` c2), (c1 ` hs1), hs0 = hs1)
  fveq2(hs0, hs1, c1)
  eleq1d((c1 ` hs0), (‚Ñ§‚â• ` c2), (c1 ` suc(hs1)), hs0 = suc(hs1))
  fveq2(hs0, suc(hs1), c1)
  eleq1d((c1 ` hs0), (‚Ñ§‚â• ` c2), (c1 ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, c1)
  eqeltri((c1 ` ‚àÖ), (‚Ñ§‚â• ` c2), c2)
  om2uz0i(s0, c1, c2)
  ax-mp(c2 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c2), c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§)
  uzid(c2)
  syl5ibr(hs1 ‚àà _om, (c1 ` hs1)‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c2), (c1 ` suc(hs1))‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c2), ((c1 ` hs1)[+]1)‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c2))
  peano2uz((c1 ` hs1), c2)
  eleq1d((c1 ` suc(hs1)), (‚Ñ§‚â• ` c2), ((c1 ` hs1)[+]1), hs1 ‚àà _om)
  om2uzsuci(s0, hs1, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((c1 ` c0)‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c2))
  diff.hs0.w((c1 ` ‚àÖ)‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c2))
  diff.hs0.w((c1 ` hs1)‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c2))
  diff.hs0.w((c1 ` suc(hs1))‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c2))
  diff.hs1.w((c1 ` hs0)‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c2))
}

blocks.name: om2uzlti
blocks.content: Less-than relation for ` G ` (see ~ om2uz0i ). (Contributed by NM, 3-Oct-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Sep-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm om2uzlti(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com)), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, c1))))
  -| wcel(c3, cz)
  -| wceq(c2, cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), c3), com))
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  impcom(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, c1))))
  finds(hs0, hs1, c1, wi(wcel(c0, com), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, c1)))), wi(wcel(c0, com), wi(wcel(c0, cv(hs0)), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))))), wi(wcel(c0, com), wi(wcel(c0, emptycls), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, emptycls)))), wi(wcel(c0, com), wi(wcel(c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, cv(hs1))))), wi(wcel(c0, com), wi(wcel(c0, csuc(cv(hs1))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, csuc(cv(hs1)))))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wcel(c0, com), wi(wcel(c0, cv(hs0)), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), wi(wcel(c0, emptycls), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, emptycls))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wcel(c0, cv(hs0)), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), wcel(c0, emptycls), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, emptycls)))
  eleq2(cv(hs0), emptycls, c0)
  breq2d(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), emptycls, c2)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(c0, com), wi(wcel(c0, cv(hs0)), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), wi(wcel(c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, cv(hs1)))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(c0, cv(hs0)), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), wcel(c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, cv(hs1))))
  eleq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0)
  breq2d(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c2)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1))), wcel(c0, com), wi(wcel(c0, cv(hs0)), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), wi(wcel(c0, csuc(cv(hs1))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, csuc(cv(hs1))))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1))), wcel(c0, cv(hs0)), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), wcel(c0, csuc(cv(hs1))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, csuc(cv(hs1)))))
  eleq2(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1)), c0)
  breq2d(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, csuc(cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1))))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1)), c2)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(c0, com), wi(wcel(c0, cv(hs0)), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, c1))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(c0, cv(hs0)), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, c1)))
  eleq2(cv(hs0), c1, c0)
  breq2d(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c1, c2)
  a1i(wcel(c0, com), wi(wcel(c0, emptycls), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, emptycls))))
  pm2.21i(wcel(c0, emptycls), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, emptycls)))
  noel(c0)
  a2d(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wcel(c0, com), wi(wcel(c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, cv(hs1)))), wi(wcel(c0, csuc(cv(hs1))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, csuc(cv(hs1))))))
  expcom(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wcel(c0, com), wi(wi(wcel(c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, cv(hs1)))), wi(wcel(c0, csuc(cv(hs1))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, csuc(cv(hs1)))))))
  syl5ib(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(cv(hs1), com)), wi(wcel(c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, cv(hs1)))), wi(wcel(c0, csuc(cv(hs1))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, csuc(cv(hs1))))), wi(wo(wcel(c0, cv(hs1)), wceq(c0, cv(hs1))), wo(wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, cv(hs1))), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(c2, cv(hs1))))))
  orim12d(wi(wcel(c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, cv(hs1)))), wcel(c0, cv(hs1)), wceq(c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, cv(hs1))), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(c2, cv(hs1))))
  id(wi(wcel(c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, cv(hs1)))))
  a1i(wi(wcel(c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, cv(hs1)))), wi(wceq(c0, cv(hs1)), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(c2, cv(hs1)))))
  fveq2(c0, cv(hs1), c2)
  imbi12d(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(cv(hs1), com)), wo(wcel(c0, cv(hs1)), wceq(c0, cv(hs1))), wo(wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, cv(hs1))), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(c2, cv(hs1)))), wcel(c0, csuc(cv(hs1))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, csuc(cv(hs1)))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, com), wcel(cv(hs1), com), wb(wo(wcel(c0, cv(hs1)), wceq(c0, cv(hs1))), wcel(c0, csuc(cv(hs1)))))
  bicomd(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wo(wcel(c0, cv(hs1)), wceq(c0, cv(hs1))), wcel(c0, csuc(cv(hs1))))
  elsuc2g(cv(hs1), com, c0)
  3bitr2rd(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(cv(hs1), com)), wo(wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, cv(hs1))), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(c2, cv(hs1)))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, csuc(cv(hs1)))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, co(cfv(c2, cv(hs1)), caddc, nat1)), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), cle, cfv(c2, cv(hs1))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, com), wcel(cv(hs1), com), wb(wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, csuc(cv(hs1)))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, co(cfv(c2, cv(hs1)), caddc, nat1))))
  breq2d(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, csuc(cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c2, cv(hs1)), caddc, nat1), wcel(cv(hs1), com))
  om2uzsuci(s0, cv(hs1), c2, c3)
  syl2an(wcel(c0, com), wcel(cv(hs1), com), wb(wbr(cfv(c2, c0), cle, cfv(c2, cv(hs1))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, co(cfv(c2, cv(hs1)), caddc, nat1))), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(cuz, c3)), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(hs1)), cfv(cuz, c3)))
  syl2an(wcel(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(cuz, c3)), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(hs1)), cfv(cuz, c3)), wb(wbr(cfv(c2, c0), cle, cfv(c2, cv(hs1))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, co(cfv(c2, cv(hs1)), caddc, nat1))), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), cz), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(hs1)), cz))
  zleltp1(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(c2, cv(hs1)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, com), wcel(cv(hs1), com), wb(wbr(cfv(c2, c0), cle, cfv(c2, cv(hs1))), wo(wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, cv(hs1))), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(c2, cv(hs1))))), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), cr), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(hs1)), cr))
  zred(cfv(c2, c0), wcel(c0, com))
  syl(wcel(c0, com), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), cz), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(cuz, c3)))
  om2uzuzi(s0, c0, c2, c3)
  eluzelz(cfv(c2, c0), c3)
  zred(cfv(c2, cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), com))
  syl(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(hs1)), cz), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(hs1)), cfv(cuz, c3)))
  om2uzuzi(s0, cv(hs1), c2, c3)
  eluzelz(cfv(c2, cv(hs1)), c3)
  leloe(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(c2, cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wcel(c0, com), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, c1)))))

  diff.hs0.w(wi(wcel(c0, com), wi(wcel(c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, cv(hs1))))))
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wcel(c0, com), wi(wcel(c0, csuc(cv(hs1))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, csuc(cv(hs1)))))))
  diff.hs1.w(wi(wcel(c0, com), wi(wcel(c0, cv(hs0)), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))))))
}

thm om2uzlt2i(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com)), wb(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, c1))))
  -| wcel(c3, cz)
  -| wceq(c2, cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), c3), com))
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  impcon4bid(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com)), wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, c1)))
  om2uzlti(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  3imtr3d(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com)), wn(wcel(c0, c1)), wn(wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, c1))), wo(wcel(c1, c0), wceq(c1, c0)), wo(wbr(cfv(c2, c1), clt, cfv(c2, c0)), wceq(cfv(c2, c1), cfv(c2, c0))))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wi(wo(wcel(c1, c0), wceq(c1, c0)), wo(wbr(cfv(c2, c1), clt, cfv(c2, c0)), wceq(cfv(c2, c1), cfv(c2, c0)))))
  orim12d(wa(wcel(c1, com), wcel(c0, com)), wcel(c1, c0), wceq(c1, c0), wbr(cfv(c2, c1), clt, cfv(c2, c0)), wceq(cfv(c2, c1), cfv(c2, c0)))
  om2uzlti(s0, c1, c0, c2, c3)
  a1i(wa(wcel(c1, com), wcel(c0, com)), wi(wceq(c1, c0), wceq(cfv(c2, c1), cfv(c2, c0))))
  fveq2(c1, c0, c2)
  syl2anr(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wb(wo(wcel(c1, c0), wceq(c1, c0)), wn(wcel(c0, c1))), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c0, con0))
  nnon(c1)
  nnon(c0)
  bitr3d(wa(wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c0, con0)), wo(wcel(c1, c0), wceq(c1, c0)), wn(wcel(c0, c1)), wss(c1, c0))
  onsseleq(c1, c0)
  ontri1(c1, c0)
  syl2anr(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wb(wo(wbr(cfv(c2, c1), clt, cfv(c2, c0)), wceq(cfv(c2, c1), cfv(c2, c0))), wn(wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, c1)))), wcel(cfv(c2, c1), cr), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), cr))
  syl(wcel(c1, com), wcel(cfv(c2, c1), cr), wcel(cfv(c2, c1), cfv(cuz, c3)))
  om2uzuzi(s0, c1, c2, c3)
  eluzelre(cfv(c2, c1), c3)
  syl(wcel(c0, com), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), cr), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(cuz, c3)))
  om2uzuzi(s0, c0, c2, c3)
  eluzelre(cfv(c2, c0), c3)
  bitr3d(wa(wcel(cfv(c2, c1), cr), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), cr)), wo(wbr(cfv(c2, c1), clt, cfv(c2, c0)), wceq(cfv(c2, c1), cfv(c2, c0))), wn(wbr(cfv(c2, c0), clt, cfv(c2, c1))), wbr(cfv(c2, c1), cle, cfv(c2, c0)))
  leloe(cfv(c2, c1), cfv(c2, c0))
  lenlt(cfv(c2, c1), cfv(c2, c0))
}

thm om2uzrani(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {

  eleq1(cv(hs1), c1, crn(c0))
  eleq1(cv(hs1), co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), crn(c0))
  eleq1(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), crn(c0))
  eqeltrri(c1, crn(c0), cfv(c0, emptycls))
  om2uz0i(s0, c0, c1)

  fnfvelrn(c0, com, emptycls)
  a1i(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c1)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c0)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), crn(c0))))
  sylbi(wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c0)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), crn(c0)), wrex(hs1, com, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))))

  fvelrnb(hs1, c0, com, cv(hs0))
  rexlimiva(hs1, com, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), crn(c0)))

  om2uzsuci(s0, cv(hs1), c0, c1)
  oveq1(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)
  adantr(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cfv(c0, csuc(cv(hs1))), crn(c0)))
  sylancr(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wcel(cfv(c0, csuc(cv(hs1))), crn(c0)), wfn(c0, com), wcel(csuc(cv(hs1)), com))
  mpbir(wfn(c0, com), wfn(cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), c1), com), com))
  frfnom(cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), c1)

blocks.name: om2uzrdg
blocks.content: A helper lemma for the value of a recursive definition generator on upper integers (typically either ` NN ` or ` NN0 ` ) with characteristic function ` F ( x , y ) ` and initial value ` A ` . Normally ` F ` is a function on the partition, and ` A ` is a member of the partition. See also comment in ~ om2uz0i . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 18-Nov-2014.)

thm om2uzrdg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {

blocks.name: uzrdglem
blocks.content: A helper lemma for the value of a recursive definition generator on upper integers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 18-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm uzrdglem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c1)), wcel(cop(c0, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c2, cfv(ccnv(c3), c0)))), crn(c2)))
  -| wcel(c1, cz)
  -| wceq(c3, cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), c1), com))
  -| wcel(c4, universe)
  -| wceq(c2, cres(crdg(cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)))), cop(c1, c4)), com))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {
  eqeltrrd(cop(c0, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c2, cfv(ccnv(c3), c0)))), crn(c2), cfv(c2, cfv(ccnv(c3), c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c1)))
  eqtrd(cfv(c2, cfv(ccnv(c3), c0)), cop(c0, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c2, cfv(ccnv(c3), c0)))), cop(cfv(c3, cfv(ccnv(c3), c0)), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c2, cfv(ccnv(c3), c0)))), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c1)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c1)), wceq(cfv(c2, cfv(ccnv(c3), c0)), cop(cfv(c3, cfv(ccnv(c3), c0)), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c2, cfv(ccnv(c3), c0))))), wcel(cfv(ccnv(c3), c0), com))
  om2uzrdg(s0, s1, cfv(ccnv(c3), c0), c2, c3, c1, c4, c5)
  opeq1d(cfv(c3, cfv(ccnv(c3), c0)), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c2, cfv(ccnv(c3), c0))), c0, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c1)))
  mpan(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c1)), wceq(cfv(c3, cfv(ccnv(c3), c0)), c0), wf1o(c3, com, cfv(cuz, c1)))
  f1ocnvfv2(c3, com, cfv(cuz, c1), c0)
  sylancr(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c1)), wcel(cfv(c2, cfv(ccnv(c3), c0)), crn(c2)), wfn(c2, com), wcel(cfv(ccnv(c3), c0), com))
  mpbir(wfn(c2, com), wfn(cres(crdg(cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)))), cop(c1, c4)), com), com))
  frfnom(cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)))), cop(c1, c4))
  fneq1i(c2, com, cres(crdg(cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)))), cop(c1, c4)), com))
  mpan(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c1)), wcel(cfv(ccnv(c3), c0), com), wf1o(c3, com, cfv(cuz, c1)))
  om2uzf1oi(s0, c3, c1)
  f1ocnvdm(c3, com, cfv(cuz, c1), c0)
  fnfvelrn(c2, com, cfv(ccnv(c3), c0))
}

thm uzrdglem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c1)‚Üí < c0,(2nd `(c2 `(`' c3 ` c0)))> ‚àà ran(c2))
  ‚ä£ c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§
  ‚ä£ c3 =(rec((s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s0[+]1)), c1)|` _om)
  ‚ä£ c4 ‚àà ùïå
  ‚ä£ c2 =(rec((s0 ‚àà ùïå, s1 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ <(s0[+]1),(s0[c5]s1)>), < c1, c4 >)|` _om)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c5)
} = {
  eqeltrrd(< c0,(2nd `(c2 `(`' c3 ` c0)))>, ran(c2), (c2 `(`' c3 ` c0)), c0 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c1))
  eqtrd((c2 `(`' c3 ` c0)), < c0,(2nd `(c2 `(`' c3 ` c0)))>, <(c3 `(`' c3 ` c0)),(2nd `(c2 `(`' c3 ` c0)))>, c0 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c1))
  syl(c0 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c1), (c2 `(`' c3 ` c0))= <(c3 `(`' c3 ` c0)),(2nd `(c2 `(`' c3 ` c0)))>, (`' c3 ` c0)‚àà _om)
  om2uzrdg(s0, s1, (`' c3 ` c0), c2, c3, c1, c4, c5)
  opeq1d((c3 `(`' c3 ` c0)), (2nd `(c2 `(`' c3 ` c0))), c0, c0 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c1))
  mpan(c0 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c1), (c3 `(`' c3 ` c0))= c0, (c3 : _om ‚Üî(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c1)))
  f1ocnvfv2(c3, com, (‚Ñ§‚â• ` c1), c0)
  sylancr(c0 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c1), (c2 `(`' c3 ` c0))‚àà ran(c2), c2[Fn]_om, (`' c3 ` c0)‚àà _om)
  mpbir(c2[Fn]_om, (rec((s0 ‚àà ùïå, s1 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ <(s0[+]1),(s0[c5]s1)>), < c1, c4 >)|` _om)[Fn]_om)
  frfnom((s0 ‚àà ùïå, s1 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ <(s0[+]1),(s0[c5]s1)>), < c1, c4 >)
  fneq1i(c2, com, (rec((s0 ‚àà ùïå, s1 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ <(s0[+]1),(s0[c5]s1)>), < c1, c4 >)|` _om))
  mpan(c0 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c1), (`' c3 ` c0)‚àà _om, (c3 : _om ‚Üî(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c1)))
  om2uzf1oi(s0, c3, c1)
  f1ocnvdm(c3, com, (‚Ñ§‚â• ` c1), c0)
  fnfvelrn(c2, com, (`' c3 ` c0))
}

blocks.name: uzrdgfni
blocks.content: The recursive definition generator on upper integers is a function. See comment in ~ om2uzrdg . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm uzrdgfni(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wfn(c0, cfv(cuz, c1))
  -| wcel(c1, cz)
  -| wceq(c2, cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), c1), com))
  -| wcel(c3, universe)
  -| wceq(c4, cres(crdg(cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)))), cop(c1, c3)), com))
  -| wceq(c0, crn(c4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)

  syl2anc(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c1)), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, c1), co(c0, caddc, co(nat1, cmin, c1))), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz))

  3syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c1)), wbr(co(nat1, cfz, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, c1)), cen, cfv(ccnv(c2), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, c1))), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cfv(cuz, c1)), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, c1), cn0))

blocks.name: cardfz
blocks.content: The cardinality of a finite set of sequential integers. (See ~ om2uz0i for a description of the hypothesis.) (Contributed by NM, 7-Nov-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Sep-2013.)

thm cardfz(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(cfv(ccrd, co(nat1, cfz, c0)), cfv(ccnv(c1), c0)))
  -| wceq(c1, cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), nat0), com))
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(ccrd, co(nat1, cfz, c0)), cfv(ccnv(c1), c0), cfv(ccrd, cfv(ccnv(c1), c0)), wcel(c0, cn0))
  syl(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(cfv(ccrd, co(nat1, cfz, c0)), cfv(ccrd, cfv(ccnv(c1), c0))), wbr(co(nat1, cfz, c0), cen, cfv(ccnv(c1), c0)))
  fzennn(s0, c0, c1)
  carden2b(co(nat1, cfz, c0), cfv(ccnv(c1), c0))
  syl(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(cfv(ccrd, cfv(ccnv(c1), c0)), cfv(ccnv(c1), c0)), wcel(cfv(ccnv(c1), c0), com))
  sylancr(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(cfv(ccnv(c1), c0), com), wf1o(c1, com, cfv(cuz, nat0)), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat0)))
  om2uzf1oi(s0, c1, nat0)
  0z()
  biimpi(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat0)))
  elnn0uz(c0)
  f1ocnvdm(c1, com, cfv(cuz, nat0), c0)
  cardnn(cfv(ccnv(c1), c0))
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: fzfi
blocks.content: A finite interval of integers is finite. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:

  sylbi(wne(co(c0, cfz, c1), emptycls), wcel(co(c0, cfz, c1), cfn), wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  fzn0(c0, c1)
  syl2anc(wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c0)), wcel(co(c0, cfz, c1), cfn), wcel(cfv(ccnv(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), nat0), com)), co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cmin, c0)), cfn), wbr(co(c0, cfz, c1), cen, cfv(ccnv(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), nat0), com)), co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cmin, c0))))
  sseldi(cfv(ccnv(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), nat0), com)), co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cmin, c0)), cfn, com, wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  eqsstri(com, cfn, cin(con0, cfn))
  onfin2()
  inss2(con0, cfn)
  sylancr(wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c0)), wcel(cfv(ccnv(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), nat0), com)), co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cmin, c0)), com), wf1o(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), nat0), com), com, cn0), wcel(co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cmin, c0), cn0))
  hashgf1o(hs0, cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), nat0), com))
  syl(wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c0)), wcel(co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cmin, c0), cn0), wcel(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0)))
  peano2uz(c1, c0)

  f1ocnvdm(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), nat0), com), com, cn0, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cmin, c0))
  fzen2(hs0, c1, c0, cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), nat0), com))
  eqid(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), nat0), com))
  enfii(cfv(ccnv(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), nat0), com)), co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cmin, c0)), co(c0, cfz, c1))
}

blocks.name: fzofi
blocks.content: Half-open integer sets are finite. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 15-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fzofi(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wcel(co(c0, cfzo, c1), cfn)

  fzoval(c1, c0)
  fzfi(c0, co(c1, cmin, nat1))
  syl6eqel(co(c0, cfzo, c1), cfn, emptycls, wn(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz))))
  ndmov(c0, cz, c1, cfzo)
  fdmi(cfzo, cxp(cz, cz), cpw(cz))
  fzof()
  0fin()
}

  syl6an(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wral(s0, co(c0, cfz, c1), wa(wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cr), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cle, cv(hs0)))), wrex(s1, cr, wral(s0, co(c0, cfz, c1), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), clt, cv(s1)))), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), cr), wral(s0, co(c0, cfz, c1), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), clt, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))

thm fsequb(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(c0[...]c1),(c2 ` s0)‚àà ‚Ñù)‚Üí ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(c0[...]c1),(c2 ` s0)[<]s1)))

  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
} = {

  syl(wf(c0, co(c1, cfz, c2), cr), wb(wral(s1, crn(c0), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))), wral(hs0, co(c1, cfz, c2), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cle, cv(s0)))), wfn(c0, co(c1, cfz, c2)))

blocks.content: A version of ~ axdc4 that works on an upper set of integers instead of ` _om ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Jan-2014.)

blocks.name: ssnn0fi
blocks.content: A subset of the nonnegative integers is finite if and only if there is a nonnegative integer so that all integers greater than this integer are not contained in the subset. (Contributed by AV, 3-Oct-2019.)

blocks.name: rabssnn0fi
blocks.content: A subset of the nonnegative integers defined by a restricted class abstraction is finite if there is a nonnegative integer so that for all integers greater than this integer the condition of the class abstraction is not fulfilled. (Contributed by AV, 3-Oct-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm rabssnn0fi(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wcel(crab(s0, cn0, w0), cfn), wrex(s1, cn0, wral(s0, cn0, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wn(w0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(crab(s0, cn0, w0), cfn), wrex(s1, cn0, wral(s0, cn0, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wn(w0))))), wss(crab(s0, cn0, w0), cn0))
  ssrab2(s0, cn0, w0)
  bitrd(wss(crab(s0, cn0, w0), cn0), wcel(crab(s0, cn0, w0), cfn), wrex(s1, cn0, wral(s0, cn0, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wn(w0)))), wrex(s1, cn0, wral(hs0, cn0, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(hs0)), wnel(cv(hs0), crab(s0, cn0, w0))))))
  ssnn0fi(s1, hs0, crab(s0, cn0, w0))
  rexbidva(s1, cn0, wss(crab(s0, cn0, w0), cn0), wral(hs0, cn0, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(hs0)), wnel(cv(hs0), crab(s0, cn0, w0)))), wral(s0, cn0, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wn(w0))))
  a1i(wa(wss(crab(s0, cn0, w0), cn0), wcel(cv(s1), cn0)), wb(wral(hs0, cn0, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(hs0)), wnel(cv(hs0), crab(s0, cn0, w0)))), wral(s0, cn0, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wn(w0)))))
  bitri(wral(hs0, cn0, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(hs0)), wnel(cv(hs0), crab(s0, cn0, w0)))), wral(s0, cn0, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wn(w0))), wral(hs0, cn0, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(hs0)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), wn(w0)))))
  ralbiia(hs0, cn0, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(hs0)), wnel(cv(hs0), crab(s0, cn0, w0))), wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(hs0)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), wn(w0))))
  imbi2d(wcel(cv(hs0), cn0), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(hs0)), wnel(cv(hs0), crab(s0, cn0, w0)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), wn(w0)))
  con4bid(wcel(cv(hs0), cn0), wnel(cv(hs0), crab(s0, cn0, w0)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), wn(w0)))
  syl5bb(wcel(cv(hs0), cn0), wn(wnel(cv(hs0), crab(s0, cn0, w0))), wn(wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), wn(w0))), wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s0, cn0, w0)))
  nnel(cv(hs0), crab(s0, cn0, w0))
  baib(wcel(cv(hs0), cn0), wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s0, cn0, w0)), wn(wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), wn(w0))))
  elrabf(s0, cv(hs0), cn0, w0, wn(wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), wn(w0))))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s0, cn0)
  nfn(s0, wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), wn(w0)))
